name: AIModelFilter
title: AI Model Filter
description: Collapsible filter panel for filtering models by type, status, developer, and provider
functionalRequirements: Provide filters for model type, status, developer, and provider with active filter indicators

properties.name: modelTypes
properties.description: Array of available model types for filtering

properties.name: vendors
properties.description: Array of available vendors for filtering

properties.name: isCollapsed
properties.description: Whether the filter panel is collapsed

events.name: onToggleCollapse
events.description: Fired when the collapse state should toggle
